articleTitle: Birthday Celebration with 10 Personal Crushes (Patreon Exclusive)
content: We hope you enjoy watching this as much as we enjoyed making it!
This week is extra special for us at Coolom Games. Not only have we made great progress on our projects, but we are also celebrating a double birthday! Núria and Abel!
What's in the Video?

To celebrate, we decided to do something different and a bit more personal for our Patreon supporters. In this exclusive video, we'll each share 10 crushes (some more questionable than others, we admit...). It's a fun, chaotic, and very "Coolom" way to blow out the candles.
Expect laughter, surprising confessions, and maybe a little bit of embarrassment. Click the button above to head over to our page right now and watch the full chaos unfold!
Thank you all for the birthday wishes and for supporting our indie journey!

title: Dating Killmulator Update: The New Chapter is Here!
author: Coolom Team
summary: The story moves forward with unexpected twists! Find out what to expect from the latest chapter of Dating Killmulator.
metaDescription: Behind the scenes of Episode 13: Why we changed the plot from a mall date to a funeral, and the real-life story behind it.
content: We usually have mixed feelings when we launch a new episode, but with Episode 13, we are actually really proud of how it turned out. However, this episode was supposed to be completely different.
From Mall Date to Funeral
Originally, the plan for this update was simple: Abel and Florian go to the mall for a cute date, ending on a high note with a trip to Paris. But then, life happened.

Instead of pausing everything, we found ourselves writing the episode while in the midst of a real funeral. It became a coping mechanism. We realized that some of the surreal, "fake" interactions you see at funerals would fit perfectly into the chaotic world of Dating Killmulator. So, we moved the funeral plotline forward and made it the center of the episode.
What's New in Ep 13?
This update is packed with unique details:
<ul>
• Two Different Intros: Depending on whether you killed Caleb in the past or not, the episode starts differently (though the outcome remains the same... for now).
• Surreal Humor: Look out for Abel's face shining like a Renaissance painting with a literal "God ray." It makes no sense, and we love it.

• "Giving Condolences" Minigame: We added a new mechanic where you have to choose how to give condolences to Cassandra. You can be respectful, awkward, or even try to flirt with her (please don't, you piece of sh*t).
We hope you enjoy this strange, funny, and personal episode. It was a wild ride to make, and we think it's one of our best yet.

metaDescription: Important news about the end of Dating Killmulator Season 1, the upcoming break, and the roadmap for Season 2.
articleTitle: Dating Killmulator: Season 1 Finale & Future Roadmap
content: First of all, Dating Killmulator is ending this December once Chapter 14 is released.
Yes, this is sad.
No, you shouldn't be sad about it, because it will be back at the end of March with Dating Killmulator Season 2.
What to Expect from Season 2

Season 1 has always been about building mystery and developing the characters, and we are so excited to finally start answering many of the questions you've all been wondering about. Expect some wild plot twists and really fun storylines.

Season 2 will also wrap up almost all the main arcs, and it's expected to last about the same as Dating Killmulator 1. It will also introduce a TON of new and exciting content that we cannot wait to start sharing with you.
We'll keep the spoilers of this content exclusively on Patreon, so if you're interested, you can get your first month at a discount using the code "HOHOHO".
Why is there a break?

Honestly, it just makes sense for the story, and for us. The team has been working so long and so hard that you can start to see the cracks in our mental health. It's not like we'll stop working for three months; it's just that we won't be talking about it as much.

This way, we can focus on preparing chapters in advance (something we didn't do before), so if someone has a health issue we can actually pause production without you noticing, which wasn't possible before.
Thank you so much for supporting the game. We CANNOT wait to see your reactions to the final chapter. It is truly something special.
